marketplaces.name: santos
marketplaces.description: Personal Claude Code plugins using cursor-agent

files..claude-plugin/marketplace.json:
{
  "name": "santos",
  "owner": {
    "name": "santos"
  },
  "metadata": {
    "description": "Personal Claude Code plugins using cursor-agent",
    "version": "1.0.0",
    "pluginRoot": "./plugins"
  },
  "plugins": [
    {
      "name": "consultant",
      "source": "./plugins/consultant",
      "description": "Multi-model AI consultation using cursor-agent. Supports consultation, research, and deliberation modes.",
      "version": "1.0.3",
      "keywords": [
        "consultant",
        "research",
        "multi-model",
        "cursor-agent",
        "deliberation"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "skill-utils",
      "source": "./plugins/skill-utils",
      "description": "Utilities for creating and validating Claude Code skills. Scaffolds new skills for plugins or repositories.",
      "version": "1.2.0",
      "keywords": [
        "skills",
        "scaffold",
        "validate",
        "development",
        "repository"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "history-analyser",
      "source": "./plugins/history-analyser",
      "description": "Search and summarise Claude Code conversation history. Find past discussions and generate work summaries.",
      "version": "1.0.9",
      "keywords": [
        "history",
        "search",
        "summary",
        "analytics",
        "conversations"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "workflow-tools",
      "source": "./plugins/workflow-tools",
      "description": "Code review, cleanup, refactoring, PEP document workflow tools, and browser testing agent.",
      "version": "1.5.0",
      "keywords": [
        "review",
        "cleanup",
        "refactor",
        "pep",
        "workflow",
        "checklist"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "cursor-sync",
      "source": "./plugins/cursor-sync",
      "description": "Syncs Claude Code plugins to Cursor skills and commands directories with launchd watcher.",
      "version": "1.1.0",
      "keywords": [
        "cursor",
        "sync",
        "launchd",
        "skills",
        "commands"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "commit-commands",
      "source": "./plugins/commit-commands",
      "description": "Git commit workflow commands: commit, push and PR, branch cleanup.",
      "version": "1.0.0",
      "keywords": [
        "git",
        "commit",
        "pr",
        "branch",
        "cleanup"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "logo-pipeline",
      "source": "./plugins/logo-pipeline",
      "description": "Logo design generation pipeline using Gemini image generation. Generates prompt variations, calls API, evaluates results, iterates, and produces brand kits.",
      "version": "1.7.0",
      "keywords": [
        "logo",
        "design",
        "image-generation",
        "gemini",
        "branding"
      ]
    }
  ]
}
